question: A {container} of {liquid} is {vol} {unit} of {liquid}. {name} drinks {num} {container}s of {liquid} and adds {tsp} teaspoons of sugar to each {container}. Each teaspoon of sugar adds {cal2} calories. If the {liquid} has {cal} calories per {unit} how many calories did he consume?
answer: vol * num * cal + num * tsp * cal2
